name: Java Developer with Camunda BPM
description: Java Developer with Camunda BPM (Remote) Striving for excellence is in our DNA. Since 1993, we have been helping the world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software and digital experiences that change the world. We are more than just specialists; we are experts. We are looking for Java Developer with Camunda BPM to join our team. We're excited to invite IT specialists to join new innovative program Anywhere, which gives an opportunity to work and help the world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software and digital experiences that change the world from anywhere you are. We take the best of two worlds: full-time employment and remote work. This combination seasoned with sharing culture and clean code allows delivering results that drive innovation and support breakthrough strategies. RESPONSIBILITIES:  Working on challenging projects in a multinational environment as a part of a cross-functional team Participate in all cycles of software design and development Develop enterprise level software solutions according to technical specifications Contribute to the quality of coding and assure conformance of source codes Provide necessary technical and design documentation Analyze requirements and work with team members to create quality results Communicate effectively with local management and external team members Take part in daily standup meetings  REQUIREMENTS:  Proficient in Java8 & related technology stack Experience with Camunda BPM/ jBPM (at least 1 year) Good understanding of OOP Concepts Good understanding of microservice architecture Expertise with Docker and Kubernetes (will be a plus) Experience with Hibernate and JPA (at least 1 year) Proficiency in Apache Kafka Upper-intermediate or higher English level (B2) Passionate, self-driven, interpersonal skills, analytical mind, get things done attitude, and passion for engineering excellence  WE OFFER:  Competitive compensation depending on experience and skills Full-time remote work (you can work from anywhere you are) Flexible work hours Individual career path Medical insurance Compensation for sick lists and regular vacations Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions Experience exchange with colleagues all around the world
